extensionName.description: The brand name of the extension.

extensionLongName.message: Border Patrol – Débogueur CSS et explorateur d'éléments
extensionLongName.description: The long brand name of the extension.

extensionDescription.message: Débogueur box model CSS et outline d’éléments pour inspection rapide UI, visualisation de mise en page et dev frontend efficace.
extensionDescription.description: Extension description for manifest.json and Web Store SEO.

toggleBorderModeCommand.description: Command description for toggling Border Mode in manifest.

toggleInspectorModeCommand.description: Command description for toggling Inspector Mode in manifest.

borderSettings.description: Title for the border settings section.

borderMode.description: Label for selecting the border mode.

borderSize.description: Label for selecting the size of the border.

borderStyle.description: Label for selecting the style of the border.

enabled.description: Indicates that a feature or option is turned on.

disabled.description: Indicates that a feature or option is turned off.

enableOrDisableBorders.message: Activer ou désactiver les contours de bordure
enableOrDisableBorders.description: Instruction to enable or disable borders.

enableOrDisableInspectors.message: Activer ou désactiver le mode inspecteur
enableOrDisableInspectors.description: Instruction to enable or disable inspectors.

error.description: Indicates that an error has occurred.

restrictedDescription.description: Description shown when the extension is restricted from running on a page.

grantPermission.description: Button text for granting permission to the extension.

capturing.description: Indicates that the extension is currently capturing data.

takeScreenshot.description: Button text for taking a screenshot.

downloadPermissionRequired.message: Permission de téléchargement requise pour les captures d'écran
downloadPermissionRequired.description: Indicates that download permission is required to take screenshots.

downloadPermissionDenied.description: Indicates that download permission has been denied.

keyboardShortcuts.description: Title for the keyboard shortcuts section.

switchToDarkMode.description: Button text for switching to dark mode.

switchToLightMode.description: Button text for switching to light mode.

currentVersion.message: Numéro de version actuelle de l'extension : {version}
currentVersion.description: Label for displaying the current version of the extension.

selectLanguage.description: Select for changing the language of the extension.

none.description: Indicates that no option is selected.
